About

Let me introduce Myself.



I am a passionate Software Engineer with 5 years of professional experience in IT industry. With a zeal to extend my horizon in the field of technology, I explore the latest trends and standards in the market. I have a Bachelor's in Computer Science from Sardar Patel University, India. I have worked with Tata Consultancy Serives from 2012 till 2017 and have worked with financial giants such as Tata Capital Financial Services Ltd (Mumbai) and DNB Bank (Norway).
